evacuate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to send people away from a dangerous place to a safe place
evacuate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Several families were evacuated from their homes.
During the war he was evacuated to Scotland.
evacuate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to empty a place by making all the people leave
evacuate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The order was given to evacuate.
